data.lyric:
[ti:I Hate U]
[ar:SZA]
[al:I Hate U]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]I Hate U - SZA
[00:00.79]Lyrics by：Solána Rowe/Carter Lang/Robert Bisel/Cody Fayne/Dylan Patrice
[00:02.32]Composed by：Solána Rowe/Carter Lang/Robert Bisel/Cody Fayne/Dylan Patrice
[00:04.55]
[00:12.87]I be so sick of you n***as y'all contradicting
[00:16.17]I be so bored with myself can you come and f**k me
[00:19.08]I feel so ordinary sad when you around me
[00:21.39]
[00:21.91]Treat me like corduroy wear me out
[00:24.03]Arguments you air me out
[00:25.59]Tripping 'bout your whereabouts
[00:27.11]I can't keep no conflict with you boy can we just rub it out
[00:30.06]I don't want no static with you you know you my plug
[00:32.63]And I can't shake this habit no
[00:35.25]
[00:36.78]I've been up baby
[00:39.02]Heavy reminiscin'
[00:41.21]Heavy on the missin' you
[00:43.72]Wish s**t was different than what it was
[00:46.92]
[00:48.41]I've been up baby
[00:50.26]
[00:50.89]Lost in the lie of us
[00:53.26]
[00:54.00]Lost ain't no findin' us
[00:57.00]I've been up baby
[00:58.60]
[01:00.95]And if you wondered if I hate you
[01:04.22]I do
[01:05.07]
[01:05.95]S**tty of you to make me feel just like this
[01:09.06]What I would do to make you feel just like this
[01:12.42]
[01:12.95]And if you wondered if I hate you
[01:15.81]
[01:16.40]F**k you
[01:17.96]S**tty of you to makе me feel just like this
[01:21.03]What I would do to make you feel just likе this
[01:24.65]
[01:25.43]Used to be too solid 'til you scrambled me
[01:28.50]Used to be your rider you mishandle me
[01:31.55]Used to be nonviolent 'til you ambushed me
[01:34.45]Now I'm out here wildin' with you
[01:36.35]Now I'm out here silent treatment that mean no permission
[01:38.99]No
[01:39.32]Missionary gettin' boring can you switch positions
[01:42.42]Yeah
[01:42.73]Hard to save your soul you don't ever listen no
[01:46.24]No
[01:47.63]
[01:48.74]I've been up baby
[01:50.21]
[01:51.02]Heavy reminiscin'
[01:53.22]Heavy on the missin' you
[01:55.81]Wish s**t was different than what it was
[01:59.03]
[02:00.63]I've been up baby
[02:02.92]Lost in the lie of us
[02:05.21]
[02:05.86]Lost ain't no findin' us
[02:08.89]I've been up baby
[02:10.67]
[02:12.98]And if you wondered if I hate you
[02:16.12]I do
[02:17.33]
[02:17.97]S**tty of you to make me feel just like this
[02:20.97]What I would do to make you feel just like this
[02:24.12]
[02:24.95]And if you wondered if I hate you
[02:27.80]
[02:28.39]F**k you
[02:29.39]
[02:29.91]S**tty of you to make me feel just like this
[02:33.01]What I would do to make you feel just like this
data.trans:
[ti:I Hate U]
[ar:SZA]
[al:I Hate U]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.79]//
[00:02.32]//
[00:04.55]
[00:12.87]我实在是受够了你们这些家伙 所有人都在反驳我
[00:16.17]我实在是烦透了我自己 你能予我慰藉吗
[00:19.08]我感觉自己太过普通 当你在我身旁 我却只觉得难过
[00:21.39]
[00:21.91]对我不屑一顾 让我精疲力尽
[00:24.03]争吵不休 你把我当作空气
[00:25.59]追问你的行踪 让我气急败坏
[00:27.11]我们一直争吵不停 男孩 我们能全都抹去吗
[00:30.06]我不想跟你抱怨不休 你知道能激起我的爱火
[00:32.63]我改不掉这个习惯
[00:35.25]
[00:36.78]我受够了 宝贝
[00:39.02]深陷于沉重回忆
[00:41.21]对你思之入骨
[00:43.72]真希望今时不同往日
[00:46.92]
[00:48.41]我受够了 宝贝
[00:50.26]
[00:50.89]迷失在了我们的谎言里
[00:53.26]
[00:54.00]迷失了方向 找不到我们彼此
[00:57.00]我受够了 宝贝
[00:58.60]
[01:00.95]如果你不知道我是否恨你
[01:04.22]是的 我恨你
[01:05.07]
[01:05.95]就是因为你 我才走到今天这副田地
[01:09.06]我要怎么做 才能让你尝尝我的感受
[01:12.42]
[01:12.95]如果你不知道我是否恨你
[01:15.81]
[01:16.40]去你的
[01:17.96]就是因为你 我才走到今天这副田地
[01:21.03]我要怎么做 才能让你尝尝我的感受
[01:24.65]
[01:25.43]曾经坚强无比 直到你扰乱了我的心
[01:28.50]曾经指引你前行 你却让我迷失了方向
[01:31.55]曾经不喜欢暴力 直到你趁我不注意给了我重击
[01:34.45]现在我在这里 和你一起发疯
[01:36.35]现在我在这里 无言以对 意思就是我不同意
[01:38.99]不
[01:39.32]想要改变你的想法也变得无趣 你怎么可能会变呢
[01:42.42]//
[01:42.73]要拯救你的灵魂真难 你根本就不听别人的建议
[01:46.24]不
[01:47.63]
[01:48.74]我受够了 宝贝
[01:50.21]
[01:51.02]深陷于沉重回忆
[01:53.22]对你思之入骨
[01:55.81]真希望今时不同往日
[01:59.03]
[02:00.63]我受够了 宝贝
[02:02.92]迷失在了我们的谎言里
[02:05.21]
[02:05.86]迷失了方向 找不到我们彼此
[02:08.89]我受够了 宝贝
[02:10.67]
[02:12.98]如果你不知道我是否恨你
[02:16.12]是的 我恨你
[02:17.33]
[02:17.97]就是因为你 我才走到今天这副田地
[02:20.97]我要怎么做 才能让你尝尝我的感受
[02:24.12]
[02:24.95]如果你不知道我是否恨你
[02:27.80]
[02:28.39]去你的
[02:29.39]
[02:29.91]就是因为你 我才走到今天这副田地
[02:33.01]我要怎么做 才能让你尝尝我的感受
